pullrequest.title: Limit the size of the transport buffers

content.raw: Running the gz_build_test script overnight, I found several test failures that spit out Backtraces to the console. ODEPhysics_TEST failed most frequently (9 times out of about 70). Also, these tests were run without rendering, so that may have changed the timing. All the backtraces pointed to Connection::OnWrite. I'm currently working on getting a backtrace with debug info.
